alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 17 at 7:58AM PST until January 17 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional ice accumulations of 0.05 inch. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures remain well below freezing, especially along I-5 with easterly winds. Temperatures will slowly increase as winds transition to the south-southwest, though it appears to take a few more hours. While rain is beginning to slow, continued drizzle with these types of temperatures will maintain freezing rain conditions.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
